name: Owlbot
description: A Slack bot that connects to Magic

OWLBOT_SLACK.description: On your Slack Integrations page, click the 'Bots' integration (not 'Slackbot'!). Fill out the form and get an API token.

OWLBOT_CHANNEL.description: Which channel should Owlbot live in? It MUST be different than what you named your bot above.

OWLBOT_TWILIO_NUMBER.description: Buy a number here: https://www.twilio.com/user/account/phone-numbers/search. IMPORTANT: Set your messaging 'Request URL' to http://[yoursubdomain].herokuapp.com.

OWLBOT_TWILIO_ACCOUNTSID.description: Get the Account SID from here: https://www.twilio.com/user/account/settings

OWLBOT_TWILIO_AUTHTOKEN.description: Get the Auth Token from here: https://www.twilio.com/user/account/settings

OWLBOT_MAGIC.description: The phone number for Magic. (It might be wise to start with your own number to test and change it back later)
